price: Soma! Na Mola wako Mlezi ni Karimu kushinda wote!
footnotes: Endelea na kusoma, na Mola wako Mlezi aliye Karimu kushinda wote, atakutukuza wala hatakudharau.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
